DialogueOption.Text: Hey Moraine. Got any questions about the universe for me?
Hang on, why did you think there was more than one comet?
I think I found the comet you saw!

Dialogue.Page: Questions about the universe? Oh, um! I have one!
It's probably silly of me to even ask, but.. <Pause=1> How many comets are there in our star system, astronaut?
Really? But.. I thought I saw...
Um, nevermind. Thanks for telling me, astronaut! Good luck in space!
Y-yeah! Good luck in space, astronaut!
<size=20>Uugh, I need to find it again before I tell anyone about it...</size>
O-oh, um.. No, it was probably nothing..
You know how busted my signalscope is, with how much Tephra and Galena play with it. I probably just mistook a smudge.. Sorry, astronaut!
<size=20>Uugh, I need to find it again before I tell anyone about it...</size>
R-really?! Please, tell me more about it!
What was this comet like? Where was it hiding?

DialogueOption.Text: It's hidden in Giant's Deep's shadow.
It's made of gravity crystals, and the Nomai made it.

Dialogue.Page: Ohh.. So that's why it's so hard to see it.. I guess Giant's Deep must have kept it hidden from us pretty well!
But that's weird, isn't it?
Hornfels told me comets can have weird orbits.. But comets aren't supposed to stay still behind planets like that, are they? The Interloper sure doesn't do that!
Why's this comet hiding inside a planet's shadow? It's kinda creepy..
Woah, wha? The Nomai MADE the comet.. And the whole thing's made of gravity crystals..? That's. NUTS, astronaut!! Where'd the Nomai even get so many gravity crystals?!
Also, isn't a whole comet-sized chunk of gravity crystals kinda much? What could they possibly need that much for?
Were the Nomai trying to make a little artificial moon?
Haha, that's such a cute idea.. I could totally see the Nomai doing that!
Huh? A.. weapon? Like, something dangerous?
But.. Weren't the Nomai really peaceful and friendly? What'd they need a weapon like that for?
That's.. really weird.
Um... If it really is a weapon.. I'm sure the Nomai must have had a good reason to make something like that, right..?

DialogueOption.Text: Hey Moraine. Got any questions about the universe for me?
Hang on, why did you think there was more than one comet?
I think I found the comet you saw!
